meanings.sent1: I ate one of the halfs of the sandwich.
meanings.sent2: She shared the cake with me, and I got one of the halfs.
meanings.sent3: The two halfs of the heart-shaped locket fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: The two halfs of the broken mirror reflected a distorted image.
meanings.sent5: The two halfs of the puzzle finally connected to reveal the complete picture.

meanings.definition: To divide into two equal parts
meanings.sent1: She halfs the pizza before serving it to the guests.
meanings.sent2: He always halfs the apples to share with his sister.
meanings.sent3: The magician halfs the rope, but then magically restores it.
meanings.sent4: The decision to halfs the responsibilities between the team members was fair.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully halfs the ingredients to ensure equal portions in each dish.
